ComicInfo.Summary: A 96 page hardcover anthology featuring IDW's most popular horror titles and creators. The all-new comic stories include a 30 Days of Night story by Steve Niles and Ben Templesmith; a CVO story by Jeff Mariotte and Alex Garner; a Wake the Dead story by Steve Niles; a Wynonna Earp story by Beau Smith; a Lore story by Ashley Wood; and a Singularity 7 story by Ben Templesmith. Also includes prose short stories by Scott Ciencin, John Urbancik, and others.
